section.title: Run neutron DHCP agent
section.para: The OpenStack Networking service has a scheduler that lets you run multiple agents across nodes. Also, the DHCP agent can be natively highly available. You can configure the number of DHCP agents per network using the parameter dhcp_agents_per_network in neutron.conf. By default this is equal to 1. To achieve highly availability assign more than one DHCP agent per network.
